authorReview: EasyContact is great! Using them for our startup VideoTouch and I'm very satisfied! Great open source alternative of Intercom, Crisp, and other expensive chats for websites. ðŸ˜Ž

EasyContact has worked very well for our use case. The new features are just added advantages; it was working for us perfectly from the first version itself. It always solves the problem for us perfectly. No complaints.
